Business Practice: Ponoko

Ponoko[39] provides laser cutting & engraving services to turn your designs into custom products. You select from 99+ beautiful materials, download our design template, add your design to it, then upload it to get an instant online quote to make your design real. Pricing starts from $1. You can make 1 or 100,000. And your designs are made & delivered as fast as same day.

Business Practice: Ponoko Clocks

Thinking flat is about simplicity, and sometimes layers. In 3D Printing we think in layers of plastic; in Laser Cutting we can think in layers of whatever you are cutting.

Business Practice: Ponoko Cases

A great example of flat layers adding up to create more than just flat thing are Raspberry PI cases.

Business Practice: Wallets

A good example of a flat cut product that makes good money, is the wallet!
Kickstarter[40] has an article about wallets Why are there so many wallets on Kickstarter?[41] Take a look at Trayvax[42] and Dango Products[43] for more ideas.

Dremel Laser Cutter Demo ($6,499.00 - $8,499.00)

Play Video[45]

Business Practice: Laser-cut Leather

Sarah Kirkham and Anna Warren created a Leatherworking[46] business where they use a laser cutter to create fancy products.
Consider creating a similar business (see The Founder)

Dremel DigiLab Laser Cutter Luggage Tag Project

Play Video[48]

Business Practice: Laser-cut Leather

Visit Tactile Craftworks[49] for product demos.

CNC Plasma Cutter Demo

The price[50] of the CNC plasma cutter used in MAKE IT REAL[51] videos below ranges from $30,000.00 - $45,000.00, pro version is up to $92,000.00
As the part 2 says, having someone else run cutter is actually reasonably priced.
Visit the the Hacksmith[52] YouTube Channel for more.

Building Stormbreaker: Part 1

Play Video[54]

BRING ME THANOS! Building Stormbreaker: Part 2

Play Video[56]

CNC Plasma Cutter Demo: Man At Arms

Man At Arms[57] use a similar cutter, but tend to use the resulting product as a template/test for real blacksmithing.

Optimus Prime's Sword from Transformers: The Last Knight

Play Video[59]

Plasma CNC in Action

You can see the Plasma CNC in action at 4:03[60]

Waterjet Cutter Demo

A small desktop sized waterjet is about $8,000.00, take a look at Wazer[61] It can cut 0.120" Stainless Steel, Marble, Boro Glass, HDPE, Silicone, and Carbon Fiber.
Here is a small business example based on a large waterjet waterjetknives.com[62]
Visit Cut in Half[63] and Waterjet Channel[64] for more shenanigans.

cut in half - 1911 Airsoft pistol

Play Video[66]

55lb Kettlebell VS. Waterjet at 60,000 PSI

Play Video[68]

Water Trapped in Quartz Rock vs 60,000 PSI Waterjet - Enhydro Agate
